name: Konstructly
headline: The Modern Operating System for Construction
description:
Konstructly is the first piece of software for general contractors which ties payments to work approvals. It makes it possible to accurately assess what's been built on site and how much should be paid. 

Konstructly prevents overspend in construction by bridging the gap between those responsible for the payments in construction (back office) and those responsible for completing and managing the build (production). 

We digitise invoicing and payment approvals and connect them to the respective quality checks of the works, trade handovers and live progress. All of which are currently managed by unlinked, separate processes and data structures. 

The visibility we provide not only streamlines manual processes and allows much better schedule and payment management, it also incentivises productivity from subcontractors to ensure they get paid on time, in full.

**Konstructly: Revolutionizing Construction Payments**

Founded in 2023 and based in London, Konstructly is carving out a niche in the construction industry. Their mission? To build “The Modern Operating System for Construction.” They’re not just another startup; they’re tackling one of the biggest pain points in construction: the disconnect between payment processes and actual work done.

### The Problem They're Solving

Construction projects often fall victim to overspending. Why? Because the back office—the folks handling payments—often doesn’t have real-time visibility into what’s happening on-site. Konstructly bridges that gap. By linking payment approvals directly to work quality checks and live progress updates, they offer a clearer view into what’s been built and how much should be paid.

### What They Offer

At its core, Konstructly provides a suite of smart software tools that digitize invoicing and payment approval processes:
- **Change Management**: Effortlessly link subcontractor Site Instructions to variations and costs. Everything’s in one place, so nothing falls through the cracks.
- **Valuations & Payment Applications**: Streamlined payment applications mean you can value them in just two clicks. Automation takes care of the tedious stuff.
- **Live Build Progress**: Capture real-time updates, ensuring that the valuation process is robust and reflective of true site progress.
- **Quality Assurance**: Hold back payments if necessary, tying quality issues directly to payment stages. This creates a productive environment for subcontractors, incentivizing them to maintain high standards.

### The Team and Support

With a lean team of just six, Konstructly is part of the Y Combinator Batch W24, under the guidance of Group Partner Brad Flora. They’re building a community around this innovative software, already trusted by various contractors across the UK. 

### Looking Ahead

The construction industry is ripe for disruption, and with Konstructly’s approach, they’re not just photobombing the space; they’re redesigning the whole framework. If you’re involved in construction, this is a tool that promises efficiency, transparency, and ultimately, savings. Curious to see it in action? Head over to their [website](https://konstructly.com/) and request a demo.

In a nutshell, Konstructly is not just another software solution; it's a transformative approach to managing construction processes that emphasizes clarity, accountability, and efficiency. In a world where complex projects often lead to chaos, Konstructly aims to bring order.
